titleStmt.title: Aula lucis, or, The house of light : a discourse written in the year 1651. / By S.N. a modern speculator.
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, Thomas, 1622-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for VVilliam Leake, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Crowne in Fleet-street, between the two Temple Gates,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Vaughan by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Crowne in Fleet-street, between the two Temple Gates
